title: Font Metrics and Font Management Utilities for R Graphics
text: gdtools originally designed compute font metrics R graphic devices via C-level interfaces (Cairo FreeType). arrival ‘systemfonts’ package, font discovery matching became much simpler C interface longer needed packages. package since refocused. Font metric calculation follows two steps: Font lookup: ‘systemfonts’ resolves family name font file. font registered via systemfonts::register_font(), register_gfont(), font_set() found. Metric computation: Cairo reads font file computes width, ascent, descent. metrics independent graphic device. Whether match final rendering depends device resolves fonts side, device concern.
